summary: The client approved the sprint plan, leading to the creation of sprint SP-002 and the updating of stories US-010, US-015, and US-001 to 'In Sprint' status. The architect confirmed readiness to start execution upon client confirmation.

decisions.title: Create Sprint SP-002
decisions.details: Client approved the plan including stories US-010, US-015, and US-001

actions.task: Confirm to start sprint execution and generate code
